quote: Desire is a contract that you make with yourself to be unhappy until you get what you want.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought — they must be earned.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Forty hour workweeks are a relic of the Industrial Age. Knowledge workers function like athletes — train and sprint, then rest and reassess.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Competing without software is like competing without electricity.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside their control.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: To the experts, what looks like hard work from the outside, is play from the inside.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Wealth is assets that earn while you sleep
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Wealth buys your freedom
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Reading is the ultimate meta-skill that can be traded for anything else.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Status is your ranking in the social hierarchy.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The smarter you get, the slower you read.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The most dangerous things are heroin, and a monthly salary. Right, because they are highly addictive.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Smart money is just dumb money that’s been through a crash.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The secret to public speaking is to speak as if you were alone.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The fundamental delusion — there is something out there that will make me happy and fulfilled forever.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Don’t debate people in the media when you can debate them in the marketplace.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Before you can lie to another, you must first lie to yourself.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: This is such a short and precious life that it’s really important that you don’t spend it being unhappy.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Happiness is a choice and a skill and you can dedicate yourself to learning that skill and making that choice.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The first rule of handling conflict is don’t hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: I don’t plan. I’m not a planner. I prefer to live in the moment and be free and to flow and to be happy.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Who you do business with is just as important as what you choose to do.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: You’re never going to get rich renting out your time.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Clear thinkers appeal to their own authority.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Cynicism is easy. Mimicry is easy. Optimistic contrarians are the rarest breed.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Following your genuine intellectual curiosity is a better foundation for a career than following whatever is making money right now.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: To be honest, speak without identity.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Truth is that which has predictive power.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Love is given, not received.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: All greatness comes from suffering.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Happiness is a state where nothing is missing.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Escape competition through authenticity.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Morality and ethics automatically emerge when we realize the long term consequences of our actions.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: A busy mind accelerates the perceived passage of time. Buy more time by cultivating peace of mind.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: You can have the mind or you can have the moment.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: You have to surrender, at least a little bit, to be the best version of yourself possible.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: The selfish reason to be ethical is that it attracts the other ethical people in the network.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Pick an industry where you can play long term games with long term people.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: It is the mark of a charalatan to explain a simple concept in a complex way.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: If you can't decide, the answer is No.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Freedom is monetizing your curiosity.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: To make money while you sleep, build things that don't sleep.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Where attention is monetized, emotion is weaponized.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Monetize or be monetized.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Treating money as a taboo subject is the reason most people don't have any.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Freedom is monetizing distraction.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Money is what you can count. Wealth is what you can't.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Knowledge acquired is potential. Knowledge applied is profit.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Everyone you admire was once a beginner.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: It's not impossible, it just hasn't happened to you.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: No one is coming to save you. Figure it out
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Life is not long enough to get upset about everything you don’t understand.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: If it’s not worth repeating, it’s not worth saying.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: We only find out what we're capable of under pressure.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Most of us bet on everything but ourselves.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: No one knows everything, no one knows nothing.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: The more we understand, the more we appreciate.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Pain is the result of avoiding short-term discomfort.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Where options are abundant, commitment is scarce.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: You can't convince anyone until you've convinced yourself.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: When you have something to say, silence is a lie.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: If you don't say what you think then you kill your unborn self.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: If you fulfill your obligations everyday you don't need to worry about the future.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: And if you think tough men are dangerous, wait until you see what weak men are capable of.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: To suffer terribly and to know yourself as the cause: that is Hell.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: Perhaps you are overvaluing what you don’t have and undervaluing what you do.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who someone else is today.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: If you are not willing to be a fool, you can't become a master.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The purpose of life is finding the largest burden that you can bear and bearing it.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The successful among us delay gratification. The successful among us bargain with the future.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: It’s hard to do a really good job on anything you don’t think about in the shower.
author: Paul Graham

quote: if you can imagine someone surpassing you, you should do it yourself.
author: Paul Graham

quote: Don't ignore your dreams; don't work too much; say what you think; cultivate friendships; be happy.
author: Paul Graham

quote: Work with people you genuinely like and respect, and that you have known long enough to be sure.
author: Paul Graham

quote: Even in college classes, most of the work you do is as artificial as running laps.
author: Paul Graham

quote: There’s are a lot of people that are really good at seeming likeable for a while.
author: Paul Graham

quote: For the most ambitious young people, the corporate ladder is obsolete
author: Paul Graham

quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
author: James Clear

quote: Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement
author: James Clear

quote: Problem #1: Winners and losers have the same goals.
author: James Clear

quote: Be the designer of your world and not merely the consumer of it.
author: James Clear

quote: Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you wish to become.
author: James Clear

quote: Professionals stick to the schedule; amateurs let life get in the way.
author: James Clear

quote: Some people spend their entire lives waiting for the time to be right to make an improvement.
author: James Clear

quote: Success is the product of daily habits—not once-in-a-lifetime transformations.
author: James Clear

quote: You don’t have to be the victim of your environment. You can also be the architect of it.
author: James Clear

quote: We imitate the habits of three groups in particular: The close. The many. The powerful.
author: James Clear

quote: If you want better results, then forget about setting goals. Focus on your system instead.
author: James Clear

quote: Good habits make time your ally. Bad habits make time your enemy.
author: James Clear

quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
author: James Clear

quote: Whenever you feel authentic and genuine, you are headed in the right direction.
author: James Clear

quote: A very small shift in direction can lead to a very meaningful change in destination.
author: James Clear

quote: Your behaviors are usually a reflection of your identity.
author: James Clear

quote: Objects in motion tend to stay in motion. Find a way to get started in less than two minutes.
author: James Clear

quote: Motivation is overrated, environment often matters more.
author: James Clear

quote: Mastery requires patience.
author: James Clear

quote: You need to know who you want to be.
author: James Clear

quote: Habits reduce cognitive load and free up mental capacity, so you can allocate your attention to other tasks.
author: James Clear

quote: It is the anticipation of a reward—not the fulfillment of it—that gets us to take action.
author: James Clear

quote: Most days, we’d rather be wrong with the crowd than be right by ourselves.
author: James Clear

quote: Love without sacrifice is like theft.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Charm is the ability to insult people without offending them; nerdiness the reverse.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Half of the people lie with their lips; the other half with their tears
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Difficulty is what wakes up the genius
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Suckers try to win arguments, nonsuckers try to win.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Meditation is a way to be narcissistic without hurting anyone.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Abundance is harder for us to handle than scarcity.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Ideas come and go, stories stay.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: He who has never sinned is less reliable than he who has only sinned once.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Courage is the only virtue you cannot fake.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: You need a story to displace a story.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: If you do not take risks for your opinion, you are nothing.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Don’t tell me what you think, tell me what you have in your portfolio.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Scars signal skin in the game.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: The best horses lose when they compete with slower ones, and win against better rivals.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: You are rich if money you refuse tastes better than money you accept.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Education makes the wise slightly wiser, but it makes the fool vastly more dangerous.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: You can tell how uninteresting a person is by asking him whom he finds interesting.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Too much success is the enemy, too much failure is demoralizing.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Those who do too much somewhere do too little elsewhere.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: Freedom is always associated with risk taking, whether it leads to it or comes from it.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: You don’t have to solve problems for others. You can let them be uncomfortable.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: You can’t improve if you don’t know what you’re doing wrong.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: If I were a Dr., I’d prescribe books. They can be just as powerful as drugs.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: The skill for finding the right solutions for the right problems is one form of wisdom.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Anybody can make the simple complicated. Creativity is making the complicated simple.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Decisions based on improved understanding will be better than ones based on ignorance.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Time is the currency of life.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: So much advantage in life comes from being willing to look like an idiot over the short term.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Life is simple, but not easy. The problem is we want life to be easy, which makes it complicated.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Life is simple, but not easy. The problem is we want life to be easy, which makes it complicated.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Most people think they lack knowledge when they really lack focus.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Formal education will give you a career. Self-education will give you freedom.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Avoid things the best version of yourself will regret.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: A great advantage can be found in accepting hard truths faster than others.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: You get one life. Do it all. Don’t leave anything in reserve.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Don't let assholes live rent free in your life.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: You automatically fail if you don’t try.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: If you’re trying to fit in, you’ll never reach your potential.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: While we’re capable of logic, our default is pattern recognition.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: When you know what matters to you, it’s a lot easier to ignore what doesn’t.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: You can get straight As in school and still fail at life.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Avoiding stupidity is easier than seeking brilliance.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Failure is the cost of ambition.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Avoiding regret is more important to life satisfaction than increasing accomplishments.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: If you do things the same way as everyone else, expect the same results as everyone else.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: You accomplish more when you try to do something rather than try to be someone.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: The greatest prison of all is the one our ego puts us in.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Ordinary circumstances breed ordinary people.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: We don’t rise to the level of our hopes. We fall to the level of our thinking.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Live in a way that makes time your friend, not your enemy.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Hard choices make an easy life.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: The key to wisdom is forgetting what you’ve been taught.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Don't collect things. Make memories.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: When it comes to standards, what you tolerate is what matters.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: When you focus on what you'd prefer to be true, you miss what is true.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Embrace stress, don’t avoid it.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: What matters in the moment rarely matters in life. Yet what matters in life always matters in the moment.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: So much of life is getting up one more time than you fall down.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Originality often comes from obfuscating your sources.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Expecting life to be fair leads to persistent unhappiness.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Wisdom is turning down good alternatives to pursue great ones.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Be wary of those who gain a reputation of genius from calm seas.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: For a rich life combine ancient wisdom with fresh food and good wine.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Change your attitude and change your life.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Avoid getting too close to people who want results without putting in the work required. They are like a virus.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Assume life will be really tough, and then ask if you can handle it. If the answer is yes, you’ve won.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Being smart and doing something that no one has done before are two different things.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: The best thing a human being can do is to help another human being know more.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: I try to get rid of people who always confidently answer questions about which they don’t have any real knowledge.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: I would argue that passion is more important than brain power.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Do what you like and are good at.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: “Instead of looking for success, make a list of how to fail instead. Tell me where I’m going to die, that is, so I don’t go there.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Know yourself and you will win all battles
author: Sun Tzu

quote: What the ancients called a clever fighter is one who not only wins, but excels in winning with ease.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Disorder came from order, fear came from courage, weakness came from strength.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Know the enemy, know yourself and victory is never in doubt, not in a hundred battles.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: To attain knowledge, add things everyday. To attain wisdom, remove things every day.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: By letting go it all gets done.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: There is no greater danger than underestimating your opponent.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Success is as dangerous as failure. Hope is as hollow as fear.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
author: Aristotle

quote: The more you know, the more you know you don't know.
author: Aristotle

quote: If things do not turn out as we wish, we should wish for them as they turn out.
author: Aristotle

quote: No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
author: Aristotle
